title: Customer Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a customer can successfully log in using valid username and password and access permitted features.

steps.description: Navigate to customer login page
Enter valid username and password
Click on login button
User is authenticated and redirected to the customer homepage
Customer-specific features are accessible and staff/admin features are not

title: User Login Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the system prevents login with invalid username or password and shows appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click on login button
Login is rejected and error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed

title: Admin Role Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that admin users can access user management features but cannot access customer-only pages.

steps.description: Login as admin user with valid credentials
Attempt to access admin user management pages
Admin user successfully accesses user management pages
Attempt to access customer shopping pages
Admin user is redirected or access denied for customer-only pages

title: Product Catalog Filters and Sorting Performance
description: Ensure the product catalog page loads and responds to filters and sorting inputs within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog page
Product list loads fully within 2 seconds
Apply shoe size filter
Filtered product list updates within 2 seconds with correct results
Apply price sorting ascending
Product list updates within 2 seconds and sorted by price ascending

title: Add, Update, and Remove Items in Shopping Cart
description: Verify that customers can add items to the cart, update quantities, remove items, and the cart totals and discounts update in real-time.

steps.description: Login as customer
Navigate to a shoe product detail page
Add 2 quantities of product to cart
Shopping cart shows 2 units of product with correct price calculation
Increase quantity of product in cart to 3
Cart updates totals instantly reflecting 3 units
Remove the product from cart
Cart is empty and totals reset to zero

title: Apply Valid and Invalid Discount Codes in Cart
description: Verify discount code application validates eligibility conditions, updates cart totals when valid, and shows errors when invalid or expired.

steps.description: Add products to shopping cart
Apply a valid discount code meeting all conditions
Discount is applied and cart totals decrease accordingly
Apply an expired discount code
Error message 'Discount code expired' is displayed and no discount applied
Apply a discount code exceeding usage limit
Error message 'Discount usage limit reached' is displayed

title: Checkout Process with Shipping Info and Payment Methods
description: Verify that the checkout process accepts shipping information and correctly processes orders using both Cash on Delivery (COD) and VNPay payment methods securely.

steps.description: Add products to shopping cart and proceed to checkout
Enter valid shipping information
Select Cash on Delivery (COD) payment method
Confirm order
Order is created with status CREATED and confirmation is shown
Repeat checkout selecting VNPay payment method
User is redirected to VNPay gateway securely and payment is processed
Order status updates accordingly after payment confirmation

title: Order State Lifecycle and Cancellation Rules
description: Verify that order state transitions follow the defined workflow and that customers can only cancel orders in allowable early states.

steps.description: Place new order
Order initial status is CREATED
Staff verifies stock and updates order status to CONFIRMED
Order status changes to CONFIRMED
Customer attempts to cancel order in CONFIRMED status
Cancellation allowed and order status updates to CANCELED
Attempt invalid order state transition from DELIVERED back to CREATED
System disallows invalid transition with error message or blocked action

title: Staff and Manager Order Management Workflows
description: Verify staff and managers can view, update, and report on orders according to permitted roles and restricted actions for unauthorized roles.

steps.description: Login as staff user
Access order management interface
Staff can view orders and update statuses within permitted workflow
Login as manager user
Access order management and reporting pages
Manager can create reports on order statuses and usage
Attempt to perform unauthorized action like deleting order
Action is blocked and appropriate error message shown

title: Admin User Management for Roles and Locking
description: Verify that admin users can create, update, lock/unlock user accounts, assign roles and ensure role-based access control is enforced.

steps.description: Login as admin
Create a new user with Staff role
New user is created and visible in user management list
Update existing user details and change role to Manager
User role is updated and access rights reflect new role
Lock a user account
Locked user cannot log in and receives locked account notification

title: Manager Discount Code Creation and Suspension
description: Verify that managers can create new discount codes with conditions, edit existing codes, suspend and resume discount codes, and track usage accurately.

steps.description: Login as manager user
Navigate to discount management page
Create a new discount code with usage limits and eligibility conditions
New discount code appears in list with correct details
Edit discount code to change usage limit
Discount code details updated correctly
Suspend the discount code
Suspended discount code cannot be applied by customers
Resume the discount code
Discount code is active and can be applied

title: Manager Shoe Product Addition and Stock Update
description: Verify that managers can add new shoe products, modify existing product details including stock quantities, and changes reflect in catalog.

steps.description: Login as manager
Navigate to add new shoe product page
Input all mandatory product details and stock information
Submit new product form
Product is created and appears in product catalog
Modify an existing product's stock quantity
Stock quantity is updated and reflected in product detail and availability

title: Session Management and Logout Functionality
description: Verify that session is maintained correctly during user activities and logout invalidates session and restricts access.

steps.description: Login as customer
Navigate through various pages maintaining session
User remains authenticated and session data persists
Perform logout action
User session is terminated and accessing protected pages redirects to login

title: Secure Payment Data Integrity and Redirection Handling
description: Verify that payment data is securely handled during VNPay redirection and that transaction integrity is maintained.

steps.description: Initiate checkout and select VNPay payment method
System redirects user to VNPay payment gateway
Redirect uses secured HTTPS and correct transaction parameters
Complete payment on VNPay gateway
System receives payment confirmation callback
Order payment status updates correctly and reflects in backend
Simulate payment failure scenario
System notifies user of payment failure and order remains unpaid
